title: 5 Important Reasons To Buy An Eco-Friendly Car
10 reasons why environmental protection is so important
introduction: I'm Christoph and I started this blog. Here I write about sustainability, environmental protection, a natural-conscious life and personal development.

title: Why Sketching Is An Important Part of The Design Process
7 reasons why sketching is more important then drawing
introduction: It seems to be a contradictory claim because making a beautiful drawing is often the ultimate goal. Nevertheless, I think it is extremely important to be able to make a good sketch. Perhaps this is more important than being able to draw nicely.
